item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
KUDETA

Join us for another fun happy hour at Kudeta (27 Temple Street). There will be drink specials and some light food. And if you are hungry, you can always order sushi and appetizers. They are going to put us in that wonderful sushi bar area again.

Kudeta's website:
www.Kudetanewhaven.com

"Experience the flavors of Asian fusion cuisine in an atmosphere designed to captivate your senses."

DRINK SPECIALS:
$1.00 off well drinks and drafts

Contact info: Andrea 203-641-8083

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour 12/10 at Kudeta
